record.field: Missing account on Batch Journal. Please configure the Batch Journal before proceeding.

There are unposted batch lines for one of the accounts used in the journal of this batch.
You must proceed these batch lines before being able to create further transactions.
Account and contra account are the same. Please provide different accounts.
Amount %s is greater than the amount to pay for invoice %s (Seq.: %s): %s.
This tax requires a vat code. Please provide a party with a valid vat code.
No open period found for fiscalyear %s.
To create a line on account "%(account)s", you must set a type.
To create a line on account "%(account)s", you must reopen it.
